googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Taylor Johnson
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Called several times to have someone come out to look at our water heater that we have a warranty on and nobody will call back or fix our problems.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bates Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kyle Buntin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Hands down the best plumbing service in town! I've been using Andrew for years at home and at the dealership I work at. Highly Recommend!!!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bates Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Abernathy-Smith
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Andrew Bates is the most reliable plumber I know. He is extremely knowledgeable and trustworthy. I would recommend him to anyone who is in need of a plumber. He fixed my grandmother’s sink and did a excellent job. He had to crawl through multiple spider webs, stagnant water, and mud to fix the problem. Even more impressive, he did not charge my grandmother, who’s 87, has health problems, and very little income one single penny. That’s a stand up guy in my book and I’ll forever be grateful for what he did for her. I Highly Recommend!!!!’
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bates Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ina Blankenship
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Excellent quality work; reasonable rates; very professional and extremely knowledgeable about all aspects of plumbing! When he schedules time he is always prompt; if can’t make it due to an emergency he lets you know. He provides solutions to problems an executives correctly. Best plumbing company in town! I recommend him to family and friends! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Not sure who the individual was that said he was unprofessional but obvious to me he doesn’t know anything about this company!🤔
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bates Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Harrison Kriel
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: The owner of this company is one of the rudest people I have ever had the displeasure of meeting.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Bates Plumbing LLC

aboutUs: Bates Plumbing LLC is a trusted local plumbing company serving communities across Alabama. Our team of highly skilled and certified plumbers specializes in a wide range of services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and emergency services. We take pride in our expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to delivering exceptional results for every project.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a reliable and knowledgeable plumbing partner.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for emergencies, ensuring your plumbing issues are addressed promptly and efficiently.
State-of-the-art equipment and techniques, allowing us to tackle even the most challenging plumbing problems with precision and effectiveness.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, so you know exactly what to expect before any work begins.
